Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.engine.task

Class DynamicAppMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.util.concurrent.DynamicRunnable<T,​P,​R>
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.util.concurrent.DynamicTask<java.lang.Void,​DynamicAppInfo,​java.lang.Void>
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.engine.task.DynamicAppMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class DynamicAppMonitor
extends com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.util.concurrent.DynamicTask<java.lang.Void,​DynamicAppInfo,​java.lang.Void>
    A DynamicTask to monitor foreground to provide app specific functionality.

    Package must be granted Manifest.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS permission to detect the foreground app on API 21 and above.
